name: Uncap FPS
description: Allows you to play the game at more FPS than your screen refresh rate, which is usually 60 FPS. (Requires client restart)

name: Resource Swapper
description: Enables the resource swapper, an addon used to load custom textures, models, css into clients.

name: Updates
description: Enables the update checker, which checks for client updates on startup.

name: FPS Multiplier
description: Flex on your friends with a fake FPS boost.

name: Client CSS
description: Changes the way the UI looks.

name: Replace "CLICK TO PLAY" with timer
description: Replaces the "CLICK TO PLAY" text with the time of game remaining.

name: Sky Image
description: Replaces the sky with a custom image.

name: Fast Classes
description: Shows comp class selector for fast class switching.

name: Discord Rich Presence
description: Enables the Discord Rich Presence, which shows what you're doing in the game on Discord.

name: Show player ping
description: Replaces the WiFi icon in the player list with the player's ping.
